price: ( ߞߏ߫ ) ߦߊ߯ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߛߙߊ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
